name: Iñaki Peña Sotorres

structured_info.background: Iñaki Peña began his football career in Alicante CF's youth system in 2004 before joining Barcelona in 2012.

summary: Iñaki Peña Sotorres is a Spanish professional footballer and goalkeeper currently playing for FC Barcelona. He developed through the Alicante CF youth setup before joining Barcelona in 2012.

name: Jasper Cillessen

structured_info.background: Jasper Cillessen previously served as the starting goalkeeper for FC Barcelona before losing his position in the first team.

summary: Jasper Cillessen is a professional footballer and former starting goalkeeper for FC Barcelona.

name: Marc-André ter Stegen

structured_info.background: Marc-André ter Stegen is the starting goalkeeper for FC Barcelona and recently faced an injury.

summary: Marc-André ter Stegen is a professional footballer and the primary goalkeeper for FC Barcelona, currently recovering from an injury.

name: Neto

structured_info.background: Neto is a goalkeeper for FC Barcelona who has been noted in relation to the playing time given to Iñaki Peña.

summary: Neto is a footballer and goalkeeper currently playing for FC Barcelona. He is relevant in discussions surrounding goalkeeper rotations at the club.
